ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُوا۟ قَوْلًا سَدِيدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! have taqwa of Allah and speak words which hit the mark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you who believe, obey the commands of God, and say straightforward things
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers, fear Allah and speak the truth:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, have fear of God and speak righteous words.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and speak rightly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Have Taqwa of Allah and speak (always) the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! be careful of (your duty to) Allah and speak the right word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, fear God, and speak words hitting the mark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Guard your duty to Allah, and speak words straight to the point;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers, fear God, and say the right word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! fear Allah, and speak a straight speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Be wary of Allah, and speak upright words.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and (always) say a word directed to the Right:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! Keep your duty to Allah and fear Him, and speak (always) the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O you who believe, fear Allah and say sound statements,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! Be conscious of God, and speak in a straightforward manner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:70] O you who believe, fear God and speak words of integrity, what is proper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe! Guard your duty to Allah) obey Allah in that which He commands you, (and speak words straight to the point) and speak fair words: "there is no deity except Allah";
